sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
# Getting Started

Welcome to our documentation! This page contains all the information you need to get started with our services.

## What is This?

This documentation page pulls content directly from a GitHub repository, making it easy to update and maintain without touching the website code.

## How to Use

- Browse through the sections on the left sidebar
- Click any section to view its content
- Content is rendered with support for markdown formatting

## Next Steps

- Check out the Installation guide
- Review our FAQ section
- Contact support if you have questions

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
# Installation Guide

Follow these steps to get started:

## Prerequisites

- Make sure you have all required dependencies
- Check system requirements
- Have an active account

## Installation Steps

- Download the latest version from our store
- Extract the files to your directory
- Follow the configuration guide
- Test your setup

## Troubleshooting

If you encounter any issues:

- Check the FAQ section below
- Review system requirements
- Contact our support team

sections.title: FAQ
sections.content:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## How do I update this documentation?

Edit the docs.json file in your website-data GitHub repository and commit your changes. The website will automatically pull the latest version.

## Can I use markdown in the content?

Yes! The documentation supports basic markdown:

- # Heading 1
- ## Heading 2
- Bullet points with - prefix
- Regular paragraphs

## How often is the documentation updated?

Documentation is fetched fresh every time the page loads, so changes appear immediately after committing to GitHub.

## Can I add images to the documentation?

Currently, the documentation renderer supports text and markdown formatting. For images, you can link to them in your content.

## What if I have more questions?

Contact our support team at support@vyrostudios.com
